message.body: are you by any chance going to be around tomorrow at 2?
Possibly. I can let you know tomorrow if that helps
Sorry, for some reason this didn't go threw this morning when I sent it
no probs! i have someone else set to do it but if you tell me when you know if you're gonna be there, i can cancel with her.
Hey Laurence. I just got to the ceramics studio and ill be here for a few hours if you need me to do the peeps. Sorry I could do them earlier
daneka should be doing them. if she's not by at like 7 or so will you take care if it?
For sure. I don't have her # but if you want to let her know I'll be here I can do it.
